definitions.definition: to tell someone that you will certainly do something:
examples: [ + to infinitive ] He promised faithfully to call me every week.

definitions.definition: the act of saying that you will certainly do something:
examples: I'll put my things away tonight - and that's a promise!

definitions.definition: to do/not do what you said that you would do:
examples: If I make a promise, I like to keep it.
